A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Completely ruined the Star Wars franchise.  Made a Rotten Tomato's account just to state how horrible this film is.  TFA had a lot of problems and was not great but it at least left the potential for a lot of good things to come.  TLJ completely destroys any interest I had in this new trilogy.  I don't care about any of the characters & probably will not watch the final film.  Mark Hamill tried to warn us and he was absolutely right.  Abysmal writing and world/character development.  What they did with Luke especially was not even believable.
